headline: 2 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks That Could Make You a Millionaire
summary: Artificial intelligence, or AI, is undeniably a massive opportunity with room for multiple big winners.  Many of the most promising AI stocks have fallen out of favor recently thanks to economic uncertainty and AI spending concerns.  Advanced Micro Devices (NASDAQ: AMD), which is more commonly referred to simply as AMD, is often overlooked by investors because it holds a distant-second market share in the data center graphics processing units (GPU) space to chipmaking behemoth Nvidia, which has about 95% of the space.
